message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll find really useful. I'm asking for $140 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. What do you think?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  This is a really great product, though, so I don't think I can go any lower.
